attributes.title: One of the Worst Things Ever Created
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I am a good, true, rule following American. The minute I downloaded this app, my phone started to glitch. My phone screen went dark, my apps immobilized, and then the abbreviation “MAGA” was written out on my screen. I was horrified, no matter what I did this would not leave my screen. I finally decided that I should shut off my phone completely. My phone was shut off for a good three days. When I opened my phone back up, I was finally able to use my phone again, but somehow...it was different. My back screen was an American flag, every app had some variation of red, white, and blue as its cover art. I somehow found the Trump 2020 app amongst the different shades of America, and I finally deleted the app. This app will make you want to leave this Earth. Without even seeing what was in the app, it changed how I see the world. I would tell you to not download this app, but I am a believer in our Constitutional rights. I say, if you are as upset as I am, download the app and give it a 1-star rating. Have them take this app down for the awful way it has treated our American citizens.

attributes.title: Honestly needs more improvements
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with current information on donalds trumps campaign but this app is very disorganized and hard to move around and continuously  crashes on me

attributes.title: REMOVE THIS APP
attributes.review: this is a completely horrible application that takes well over 2 days to download, also.. Trump is a fascist :) hope this app gets removed.

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: It makes all of my apps and whole phone crash. Every since I opened up the app, it’s made my phone go haywire. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: Cursed
attributes.review: This app is cursed. Once I dowloaded the app, my cat spoke to me in the language known as common sense to delete such a devilish app. Maybe devilish is such a harsh word. Even demons aren’t as bad as this app. Heck I’ve seen more hate and racism on this app then the hells of fire.

attributes.title: Concerns
attributes.review: This app is terrible. I don't have any belief in this app getting better
